title: Muscle Cmdr Men's Ribbed Henley Shirt Slim Fit Muscle Shirt Fitted Cotton Short&Long Sleeve Casual T-Shirt
description: 【Suggest Size】Please refer to our size chart.If you like loose fit,Please one size up.【Chest-S:36-38",Length:27"】；【Chest-M:38-40",Length:28"】；【Chest-L:40-42",Length:29"】；【Chest-XL:42-44",Length:30"】；【Chest-XXL:44-46",Length:31"】.If you are not completely satisfied, you can send it back, no questions asked.

【100%Cotton.Double knit, ribbed knit surface.】It is not a heavy weight fabric, so it is suitable for year-round wear. Can be worn on its own or as a base layer. Short sleeves 230±g. Long sleeve 320±g.This is a T-shirt suitable for spring, summer, autumn and winter. Whether used as a base layer or worn alone, you will not be disappointed.
【Material】Fabric woven with four-way stretch that provides comfortable movement, elasticity, and maximum recovery. It is normal for ribbed elastic fabrics to shrink after washing.

【Style】Front placket 3 buttons closure design, stylish style.Slim fit, no back collar label, will not cause discomfort to the neck.Premium fabric elevated by subtle stripes makes our exclusive sweaters luxuriously soft, warm, lightweight, and breathable.
【Occasion】 Suitable for casual, dating, outdoor activity,workout,party or other semi-formal occasion. Can be worn on any occasion, as long as you like.
